name: strictly-formed-io-ts
description: io-ts wrapper for strictly-formed, a statically typed form library for typescript

scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.deploy:patch: npm run validate && npm version patch && npm run build && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.deploy:minor: npm run validate && npm version minor && npm run build && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.deploy:major: npm run validate && npm version major && npm run build && npm publish && git push --follow-tags

author: James Conkling <james.lane.conkling@gmail.com>
